intros X' times' sum one zero M_sum sum_comm sum_cancel M_times distr_l distr_r b n f.
intros X' times' sum' one zero M_sum sum_comm sum_cancel M_times distr_l distr_r b n f.
intros X' times' sum' one' zero M_sum sum_comm sum_cancel M_times distr_l distr_r b n f.
intros X' times' sum' one' zero' M_sum sum_comm sum_cancel M_times distr_l distr_r b n f.

intros X' times' sum' one' zero' M_sum' sum_comm' sum_cancel' M_times' distr_l distr_r b n f.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
Cannot find an homogeneous relation to rewrite.
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Found no subterm matching "∑ n (fun i : nat => b ⊗ f i)" in the current goal.

In environment X : Type sum, times : X -> X -> X zero, one : X M_sum : monoid_theory sum z sum_comm : forall x y : X, x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x sum_cancel : forall x u v : X, x ⊕ u = x ⊕ v -> u = v M_times : monoid_theory times o distr_l : forall x y z : X, x ⊗ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊗ y ⊕ x ⊗ z distr_r : forall x y z : X, (y ⊕ z) ⊗ x = y ⊗ x ⊕ z ⊗ x b : X n : nat f : nat -> X IHn : ∑ n (fun i : nat => b ⊗ f i) = b ⊗ ∑ n f Unable to unify "b ⊗ f 0 ⊕ b ⊗ ∑ n (fun n : nat => f (S n))" with "b ⊗ f 0 ⊕ ∑ n (fun n : nat => b ⊗ f (S n))".

original: intros X times sum one zero M_sum sum_comm sum_cancel M_times distr_l distr_r b n f. induction n. - simpl. apply monoid_unit_l with (m:=sum) (u:=zero) in M_sum. rewrite M_sum. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite distr_l. rewrite IHn. reflexivity.
